title: PROJECT: Jhin bug.
body: I've recently encouter a bug where the red particles on PROJECT: Jhin's face are absent. I suppose that's not the way the skin was made. I have no idea how the bug was triggered but i hope this helps.

replies.body:
Hey Azir ya Boy! 

I appreciate the report! Please use the [PBE boards](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com) to report issues occurring on PBE - it better helps us keep track of where issues are occurring. :) You can also drop bugs (and feedback) in a skin's [feedback thread](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/YT9ix8ef-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-project-jhin)!

Well for some reason my PBE boards site doesn't work. That was my first idea , to post it there, but since the site was unresponsive I taught that I should at least post it here if no one encoutered the bug previously.
Oh no! I can take a look at that on Monday. You're right, it's better to be safe than sorry. :)
any plans to tweak project jhin skin like the fur , the coat or the voice filter

I'm unfortunately not QA on this particular skin, and don't have much context on any changes being made. Looking at where we are in the patch cycle, if there any any changes, they'd be on PBE already, or Monday at the absolute latest.
